mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCTID, CATEGORYID, USERID, p_name, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, PRODUCTIMG FROM ( SELECT p.PRODUCTID, CATEGORYID, p.USERID, PNAME as p_name, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, PRODUCTIMG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY p.productid ORDER BY o.orderdate) AS RN FROM PRODUCT p, LINEITEM l, ORDER_TABLE o where p.productid = l.productid and l.orderid = o.orderid and o.orderdate BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-1) AND sysdate order by count(*) ) R WHERE R.RN=1
